*nat
:PREROUTING ACCEPT [0:0]
:INPUT ACCEPT [0:0]
:POSTROUTING ACCEPT [0:0]
:OUTPUT ACCEPT [0:0]
COMMIT
# Completed on Sun Oct 10 00:58:24 2021
# Generated by xtables-save v1.8.2 on Sun Oct 10 00:58:24 2021
*filter
:INPUT DROP [0:0]
:FORWARD DROP [0:0]
:OUTPUT DROP [0:0]
-A INPUT -i lo -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -m conntrack --ctstate RELATED,ESTABLISHED -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -p udp -m udp --dport 1900 -j DROP
-A INPUT -p tcp -m tcp --dport 1900 -j DROP
-A INPUT -m conntrack --ctstate INVALID -j DROP
-A INPUT -m state --state INVALID -j LOG --log-prefix "DROP INVALID " --log-tcp-options --log-ip-options
-A INPUT -m state --state INVALID -j DROP
-A INPUT -p udp -m udp --dport 22 -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -p tcp -m tcp --dport 22 -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -j LOG --log-tcp-options --log-ip-options
-A INPUT -j DROP
-A FORWARD -j LOG --log-tcp-options --log-ip-options
-A FORWARD -j DROP
-A OUTPUT -p udp -m udp --dport 1900 -j DROP
-A OUTPUT -p tcp -m tcp --dport 1900 -j DROP
-A OUTPUT -m state --state INVALID -j LOG --log-prefix "DROP INVALID " --log-tcp-options --log-ip-options
-A OUTPUT -m state --state INVALID -j DROP
-A OUTPUT -p tcp -m tcp --dport 80 -j ACCEPT
-A OUTPUT -p tcp -m tcp --dport 53 -j ACCEPT
-A OUTPUT -p tcp -m tcp --dport 443 -j ACCEPT
-A OUTPUT -p tcp -m tcp --dport 22 -j ACCEPT
-A OUTPUT -p tcp -m tcp --dport 20 -j ACCEPT
-A OUTPUT -p udp -m udp --dport 53 -j ACCEPT
-A OUTPUT -j LOG --log-tcp-options --log-ip-options
-A OUTPUT -j DROP
COMMIT
# Completed on Sun Oct 10 00:58:24 2021
